ygData.subject: Help w/ Dismal Rage quests (poss spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: Even though I m DE, I am working through the human quests in Freeport. I managed to track down Groflah and slay him, and I ve ran errands for the necromancers
ygData.messageBody:
Even though I'm DE, I am working through the human quests in Freeport.
I managed to track down Groflah and slay him, and I've ran errands for
the necromancers there. I am now working on tracking down the militia
guy Sir something, but as a DE, my passage through Freeport is both
limited and dangerous (just how I like it). I was looking for a hint
to his location, and wondering about his faction (I'm KOS to the
militia, but amiable to the SK guild).

On another note, I killed Dyllin a long time ago, and looking in my
bank found the Bayle List II. I gave it to the guy who sends you
after Sir what's his name, and he said "Whatever." Now I'm trying
to do the whole quest to see who I should give it to.

Here is my speculation... I have done all the Neriak SK quests (
except the courier duties), and some of the Grobb/Oggok ones with
other chars. If a quest sword ala Soulfire is in the game, I think
it must stem from the human guilds, or some other source. I've
noticed too many of the Freeport SK quests tie in with the Soulfire
quest, but with opposing goals. I just thought it would be ironic
if in our quest for a sword we would thwart the paladins. Anybody
else notice this?

On another note, has anyone ever got a cyclops eye as loot? I've
killed Broon, and maybe Droon too, as well as several cyclopses,
and never once received one.

Xilith T'Vyn
